subject: p16826047
History: Patient status post pleural effusion and thoracentesis.
Findings: Comparison is made to the prior study from. There is a right basilar chest tube. There remains a moderate to large right-sided pleural effusion which is stable in size. There is a right-sided Port-A-Cath with distal lead tip in distal SVC. There is stable cardiomegaly. The left lung is clear. Overall, there is no appreciable change. No pneumothoraces are seen.
